Description:
A Perfect Mix of Modern Style & Absolute Convenience
In a prime position with the best of Highlands virtually at your fingertips, this tri-level townhouse is a must-see for first-time buyers & investors alike with its abundance of natural light, versatile floorplan & quality features throughout.
Perfectly presented from start to finish, the home's impressive interior comprises 2 genuinely large bedrooms (both with full-width mirrored robes), stylish central bathroom with floor-to-ceiling tiles & additional powder room (second WC). Adding to its flexibility is a separate lounge, as well as spacious open-plan living/dining areas complemented by a tastefully-appointed kitchen complete with stainless steel cooking appliances & Bosch dishwasher.
Other highlights include; split-system heating & cooling, additional ceiling fans & panel
heaters (both bedrooms), stone benchtops, solid hardwood floors, double blinds, plus front & rear balconies, concealed laundry facilities & oversized single garage (remote-control) with internal entry.
Moments from Highlands Shopping Centre, Grand Boulevard buses, Malcolm Creek parkland
& endless trails, it's close to some of Craigieburn's most popular schools including Mount
Ridley College, Mother Teresa Catholic Primary School & Hume Anglican Grammar, as well
as easy access to the Hume Freeway. Very impressive!
* Auction held at Highgate Recreation Reserve- 229 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn
Insights: 5A Huntington Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 39 other 2 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Low Maintenance Living in The Heart of Craigieburn
This home is guaranteed to impress with its generous design, impeccable presentation & long list of added features. Its smartly configured floor plan is designed for easy living, as this low maintenance residence boasts comfort & style that will delight all first home buyers, downsizers & investors alike!
From its character filled facade this home comprises 3 bedrooms (master with walk-in-robe), formal front lounge, central bathroom, gourmet kitchen with adjoining meals area & spacious family room. Step outside to a large undercover entertaining area perfect for large scale gatherings & low maintenance backyard with storage shed.
Within minutes to a range of lifestyle attractions including Malcolm Creek trails, Willmott Park Primary School, sporting facilities, public transport, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Splash Aqua Park & Leisure Centre & Craigieburn Junction.
Further features include; heating, cooling, single car garage, north-facing backyard, landscaped gardens & so much more!
* Highgate Recreation Reserve- 229 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn
Insights: 28 Jacaranda Place, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern Lifestyle Perfection with Mt. Ridley Prestige
High-end features, free-flowing design & fully landscaped surrounds highlight the appeal of this stunning home delivering a family environment of luxury & space in an enviable location.
Meticulously detailed, the home's impressive interior showcases 3 spacious bedrooms, full ensuite & walk-in robe to master, equally-stylish main bathroom, dual living zones for family comfort, large & light-filled open living/dining area complemented by a sleek stone-bench kitchen with stainless steel appliances & deep pantry.
Other highlights include; ducted heating, evaporative cooling, quality carpets & engineered floors, superior window furnishings & a large family-sized laundry with ample storage.
Step outside to a wonderfully private backyard garden complete with al-fresco entertaining area & step down to beautifully laid synthetic turf, plus the added advantage of a double garage (remote-controlled).
Mt Ridleys renowned Perisher Reserve literally within seconds where your kids can play all day, it's also close to Highlands Shopping Centre, primary & secondary schools, public transport & more!
* Auction held at Highgate Recreation Reserve- 229 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn
Insights: 7 Cradle Mountain Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
LOCATION, LAND 646m2 & PRESENTATION
Situated in a lovely street in a highly sought after pocket of Craigieburn, this superb residence boasts convenience, comfort and space throughout.
Set on approx. 646m2 this wonderful family home caters for all aspects of living. Featuring 4 generous sized bedrooms including large master with walk-in robe and spacious ensuite.
Boasting separation of living, you will be spoiled for choice with two separate living zones, featuring an open plan lounge, rumpus/theatre room and spacious kitchen/meals/family area complete with plenty of bench space and stainless steel appliances with 600mm cooktop.
Make the most of the seamless transition between indoor and outdoor living, featuring an impressive decked undercover entertaining area, accessible via the main living area making it the perfect place to relax, entertain, or watch the kids play on the expansive lawn area.
To complete the package the home is situated just moments from Highlands Shopping Center, Craigieburn Plaza, parklands, childcare facilities, Craigieburn Primary School, Mother Teresas Primary School and easy access to Hume Fwy.
The home is fitted with desirable extras ducted heating, evaporative cooling, remote garage, ceiling fans in bedrooms, LED downlights, plantation shutters, sun awnings, garden shed, BIR and much more.
Insights: 6 Bathurst Close, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Home in Prime Location ...!!!!
Universal Real Estate Vic proudly presents this conveniently positioned house in Aston and within close proximity to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Public Transport, Schools and parklands. Well equipped with all the bells and whistles to impress first home buyers or even the savviest of Investors.
SPECIFICATIONS:
- BEDROOMS: 3 Spacious Bedrooms (Master Bedroom with Walk in Robe and Full Ensuite, other 2 Bedrooms with BIR serviced by a central bathroom with bath tub.
- KITCHEN: Spacious Open Plan Living/ Dining Kitchen with 900 mm Stainless Steel Appliances including Gas Cook top, oven and rangehood, Dishwasher, Stone Benchtops, Double Fridge Space and ample of cupboards.
- LIVING AREA: 2 Living Zones , Formal Lounge and Open Plan Living/Dining Area
- HEAT/COOL: Ducted Heating and Split System Cooling.
- LAUNDRY: Spacious Laundry with ample cupboard space.
- PARKING: Double Car Garage with remote control access , Build in Cupboards in Garage for Extra Storage.
- FRONTYARD & BACKYARD: Landscaped and well maintained garden.
- ADDITIONAL INCLUSIONS: Wide Entry, High Ceilings, Downlights, Quality laminated floor boards, Linen Cupboards, Blinds and much more .....
- LOCATION: Walking distance to Royalden Park. Close proximity to Aitken Creek Primary School, Elevation Secondary College, Child Care, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Junction, Craigieburn Golf Course Supermarkets, Gym, Traffic Park, Valcano Park, Splash Aqua Park Leisure Centre. Easy access to bus stops, beautiful parklands, Child Cares, Service Stations, Restaurants/CafÃ© and Hume Freeway.
If you're in the market for that perfect all round property, then look no further than this.
Don't miss out! Call Gordon Garg - 0433 897 397 or Robbie Sandhu - 0466 074 580.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only and all photos are for illustration purposes only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent

Description:
Feels Like Home...
Set in a prestige neighbourhood this original style residence offers exceptional value as a home or smart rental investment. Comprising great sized bedrooms with built-in-robes, formal lounge room, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, kitchen with meals area, stainless steel appliances, solar panels, double lock up garage with extra storage room/kitchen with functional appliances, master bedroom with ensuite and much more. All set on a large allotment and with plenty of scope for further enhancement this cosy abode offers a stress free lifestyle situated within walking distance to the Craigieburn train station, shopping plaza, schools and leisure centre.
This property would also be perfect for somebody looking at getting into the local market, starting that investment portfolio or the smart builder/developer offering great potential to re develop into a multi-unit site (subject to council approval) in a great location.

Description:
Perfectly Positioned!
Conveniently nestled in the heart of Craigieburn & within walking distance to Craigieburn Central, Willmott Park Primary School, Good start early learning, Craigieburn Community Hospital, restaurants, public transportation & all this on a Huge parcel of land.
Boasting 3 bedrooms (master with built-in robe & ensuite), open lounge leading to a well equipped kitchen with dishwasher & meals area. Make your way outside to your very own low maintenance oversized alfresco with the added bonus of cafe blinds making all year round entertaining possible.
Further features include car accommodation, garden shed, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, split system & security shutters on main windows & ceiling fans throughout. For those looking to downsize, add to their portfolio or looking to get into the market this humble abode will not disappoint.

Description:
A hidden gem with family values
Set in a prime location within walking distance to Craigieburn Plaza, train station, schools, Craigieburn Central & sporting facilities this original style residence offers exceptional value as a home or smart investment and all on a generous size parcel of land 732m2 (approximately).
Offering 4 great sized bedrooms, built in robe and ensuite to main, spacious living zones with oversized separate lounge & open study, meals and family area. Fully equipped kitchen with great storage, wall oven and dishwasher that will surely please the fussiest of buyers.
Step outside and be pleasantly surprised with its generous sized sunroom ideal for family entertaining and large garage/workshop with its very own separate shower & toilet as well as established front and rear yard offering plenty of privacy and room for kids to play.
Boasting many extras such as split system heating & cooling, ceiling fans, downlights throughout, wall heater, 3 kilowatt solar panels and so much more. This home is sure to win the hearts of all who inspect it..

Description:
TOO GOOD TO MISS.
Nestled away in a quiet location yet only a few minutes to major shopping, sporting facilities, schools, train and easy freeway access, location alone gives this home a huge tick of approval. Starting life as a display home this one is a must see. Upon arrival as neat as can be, an attractive façade, a great floor plan offering dual living zones including formal lounge, large and well-appointed kitchen overlooking informal living & dining with sliding doors to back garden. Good size bedrooms (all with b.i.r's) including full en-suite to master, open study, double garage with split system a/c & internal access. Features include ducted heating and zoned central refrigerated cooling. Finally your search for that new home or addition to your investment portfolio is at an end, this one surely is "too good to miss".

Description:
SOLD FOR $540,000 BY CHAMARA ADIHETTY 0423 904 801
Modern Charm Offering Seclusion, Serenity and a Sensational Lifestyle
Meticulously designed and landscaped for easy lifestyle with luxurious appointments showcasing an outstanding level of comfort and class, this home delivers on all fronts.
The wide entrance leads you to a generous open plan kitchen, dining and living domain, comprehensively equipped with quality benchtop, quality appliances, for seamless entertaining. Sliding doors will lead to an outdoor entertaining zone complemented by minimal care gardens.
Accommodating 4 generously proportioned bedrooms with fitted BIRs and sophisticated bathrooms. Master with ensuite and fitted walk in robes.
A host of further features includes, gas ducted heating, Evaporative cooling, quality light fittings and remote lockup garage with internal entry.
You will be impressed by the continuity of prestigious traits throughout and love the fact that you can just move in and start to enjoy. One of the finest homes offered in the suburb and with a short stroll to Rail way station, Quality schools, shops and transport. Inspection is a must.
House Size: 21 sqrs Approx.
Heating: Ducted Heating
Cooling: Evap. Cooling
Chattels: All fixtures and fittings as inspected
Deposit Terms: 10% of the purchase price
Preferred Settlement: 30/60 Days
Council Rates: $1200pa approx.
Rental Appraisal: $400 approx.
What we love about the property:
1. Quiet pocket
2. Parkland and waterways close by
3. Close to shops and schools
4. Family friendly home
5. Ample space

Description:
SIMPLY IRRESISTIBLE!
In a blissfully quiet family-focused neighbourhood, this picture-perfect freestanding home is sure to leave a lasting impression with its generous design, immaculate presentation & central location to all of Craigieburn's facilities.
Beyond the gorgeous period-inspired facade, discover an impeccable interior comprising of 3 double bedrooms (master with walk robe & private ensuite), equally stylish main bathroom & separate WC, light-filled open living/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed stone-top kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances.
Other stand out features include; high ceilings, powerful split-system heating & cooling, ample off-street parking, gorgeous pergola setting & beautifully landscaped gardens from front to back.
Located to perfection within seconds to a neighbouring park (Hamilton Hume Reserve) walking distance to local buses, close to primary & secondary schools, kindergarten/childcare, as well as easy access to shopping centres & the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Family Expanse with Creekwood Convenience
Tucked away in a quiet cul-de-sac walking distance to Malcolm Creek trails & acres of
parkland, this distinctive home provides a terrific family lifestyle opportunity with its versatile two-storey design, quality features & wonderfully wide surrounds.
Light & bright with fresh carpets throughout, the home's spacious interior showcases 4
generous bedrooms (extra-large master) all with walk-in robes, private ensuite, main family
bathroom & guest powder room (third WC).
Along with a dedicated study area/sitting room, the home also boasts formal lounge & dining,
upstairs retreat out to balcony, open-plan living/meals area & adjoining kitchen with kitchen with dishwasher & ample cupboard space.
Ducted heating & evaporative cooling add to the appeal along with a family-sized laundry &
linen storeroom, plus a wide backyard with undercover entertaining area & remote-control
double garage complete with drive-through option.
Exceptional family flexibility, it's also close to public transport (buses on Cimberwood Drive & Hanson Road), popular primary & secondary schools, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, as well as easy access to the Hume Freeway.
Insights: 18 Gardenia Close, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
RELAX, ENTERTAIN, AND ENJOY!!!
Tucked away in a quiet court location, handy to schools and local shops. Enjoyed, loved, and beautifully maintained by its present owner for over 20 years, this family home is waiting just for you. A feeling of warmth will engulf you from the moment you walk through the front door, greeted by fresh new carpet throughout, this home ticks all the right boxes for the buyer looking to just move in and enjoy. Offers a versatile floorplan including formal lounge and dining area, through to a large and modern kitchen boasting s/steel appliances, overlooking the meals and large informal living area (with wood heater), sliding door access to a lovely covered outdoor entertaining area. Good size bedrooms, a double (secure fronted) carport, and a large block of land (657m2 approx.) complete what is a great family home.
Call now to arrange an inspection

Description:
Family Living
This feature-packed home is one that will delight all who inspect it. With its impressive block size, modern facade & functional floor plan designed for easy living, this home is sure to win the hearts of all who inspect it.
Boasting a light & bright interior with double glazed windows, this family home offers great sized bedrooms (master with walk-in robe & ensuite), separate living/4th bedroom, gourmet style kitchen with great bench space & walk-in-pantry, adjoining meals area & spacious family room which effortlessly links to an outdoor entertaining space & private backyard great for large social gatherings.
Further features include heating, cooling, alarm, laundry with walk-in storage, double remote garage with internal access, fantastic natural light, great backyard space & side access perfect for boats, trailers etc.
Perfectly positioned in a quiet & convenient location close to Newbury Primary School, Newbury Child & Community Centre, sporting facilities, Golden Sun Moth Parks, public transport, Highland shopping centre, Highlands Hotel & much more!
*Currently leased at $390 per week to amazing tenants*

Description:
Exceptional Design And A New Level Of Luxury
If you are looking for a double story home, that will offer the entire family a great lifestyle option, then this home is waiting for you to see it and grab it.
The 5 bedroom and 4 bathrooms home, offers an amazing modern design with spacious living areas downstairs and fantastic comfort upstairs.
The ground floor comprising of 2 separate living zones. Large formal lounge and a separate family and dining area adjacent to an open plan kitchen equipped with stone bench tops and stainless-steel appliances including cook top, oven, range hood and dishwasher with heaps of cupboards space. Central main Bathroom servicing your 5th Bedroom. Double Garage with internal and external access to the back yard.
Upstairs features your own private sanctuary with 2 master bedroom with ensuite and main master with a Terrace overlooking the estate and giving you nice view. Remaining 2 Bedrooms with BIR, equally modern and built for total comfort, sharing 1 extra modern bathroom.The first floor balcony accessible with a sliding door from the Rumpus room, for your family enjoyment.
Luxury Inclusions; -Ducted Heating , Evaporative cooling, Alfresco with hot, cold water and gas points, high ceilings, high doors, Floating Floor Boards upstairs, 2 master with ensuite upstairs, Rumpus Room upstairs, Balcony ,Terrace, Down lights downstairs, WIP in the kitchen, chandelier's, ceiling Fan's, Landscaped gardens and much more.
This truly is a lovely and deluxe family home, and as such it is going to choose its owners very quickly.
Within close proximity from Newbury School and Hume Anglican Grammar and Child care centres, Next to parks, Public Transport , Highlands shopping centre and only minutes away from Hume Highway.
Property not to be missed.

Description:
17 Archipelago Drive, Craigieburn !
(PLEASE USE WWW.WHEREIS.COM OR APPLE IPHONE MAPS TO FIND THE ADDRESS)
Ticks all the buyer's wish list
1. Land size - 350 sqm
2. 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms & double garage
3. Approx 15 mins walk to Newbury Primary School & community centre
4. Approx 2.6 kms to Highlands Shopping Centre
5. Approx 12 mins to Craigieburn Train Station
6. Bus stop to Craigieburn train station at 800m walk
7. Plus, if you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG!!
Only 5% to secure the property and balance on settlement!!
Mike Sarupria presents 17 Arcguoekagi Drive, Craigieburn (CURRENTLY UNDER CONSTRUCTION AND COMPLETION BY MARCH 2020) in the prestigious Highlands estate & only a short drive to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Highlands Shopping Centre & schools. Photos are from previous similar property.
This brand new home comes equipped with luxury turn-key inclusions such as professionally styled interior colour themes, stone bench tops, carpets, tiles, higher ceilings and much more. Front landscaping, driveway and quality flooring are also all included in this beautiful home.
Property Features:
- 4 spacious bedrooms, master will full double vanity ensuite and walk in robe remaining 3 bedrooms with built in robes.
- Well-equipped kitchen & stainless steel cooking appliances including 900 mm gas cook top, range hood, dishwasher, walk in pantry and island bench.
- Open plan living space comprising spacious dining and living area adjacent kitchen.
- Modern central bathroom.
- Spacious laundry
- Central ducted heating and provisions for evaporative cooling
- Concrete perimeter around the house and security alarm
- Remote control double car garage and much more!
Call Mike on 0430 126 491 or Frank on 0426 425 361 now for further information or to arrange an inspection.
Photo ID must be presented upon all open & private inspections.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List:
www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Back landscaping is for illustration purpose only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.

A short drive to Craigieburn Shopping Centre, bus stop and parkland.

Description:
CALLING ALL INVESTORS! Fixed term tenancy in place until December, 2020.
Picture perfect, this irresistible cottage charmer oozes character and personality. Offering something unique, this gem will pull at your heart strings with its surprising space, fabulous decor and superb location. Boasting large bedroom accommodation, an intimate dining / living area completed with a renovated kitchen, private pergola and backyard. Adding warmth and appeal to this practical floor plan is the classic period features and rustic timber floors to create a beautiful classic interior.
Further attributes include gardens shed, carport, ducted heating and more. Situated within minutes to public transport, Craigieburn Plaza, Leisure Centre, schools and other important amenities. This gem will be sold subject to a tenancy, with a fixed term lease in place until December, 2020 perfect opportunity for investors!
Inspection by appointment only
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*
